about: Hello! I'm Prakriti Adhikari, currently pursuing my studies in Computer Science and Information Technology (CSIT) at Padmakanya Multiple Campus. With a passion for technology and a keen eye for design, I have found my niche in the world of web designing. Exploring the intersection of creativity and functionality, I immerse myself in the intricacies of crafting visually appealing and user-friendly websites. Constantly seeking to expand my knowledge and skills, I am dedicated to honing my expertise in web development to create impactful digital experiences. In addition to my academic pursuits, I actively engage in projects and collaborations that allow me to apply my skills in real-world scenarios. Through my journey as a CSIT student, I aspire to not only excel in my field but also contribute meaningfully to the ever-evolving landscape of technology, leaving a lasting impression through my innovative designs and solutions.
